sources.title: The Benson Murder Case
sources.description: Title: The Benson Murder Case Summary: A ruthless, crooked stockbroker is murdered at his luxurious country estate, and detective Philo Vance just happens to be there; he decides to find out who killed him. Directed by: Frank Tuttle Actors: Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: 13 April 1930 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 A murder takes place virtually in front of Philo Vance's eyes which, for all intents and purposes, should mean that even Sergeant Heath could solve it and Philo can go back home. Not quite, and neither can Philo Vance for a long period of time.

metadata.Plot: A murder takes place virtually in front of Philo Vance's eyes which, for all intents and purposes, should mean that even Sergeant Heath could solve it and Philo can go back home. Not quite, and neither can Philo Vance for a long period of time.
metadata.Actors: William Powell, William 'Stage' Boyd, Eugene Pallette
